name: @coderline/alphatab
description: alphaTab is a music notation and guitar tablature rendering library
author: Daniel Kuschny

scripts.build: npm run generate-typescript && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json && rollup -c rollup.config.js
scripts.build-ci: npm run clean && npm run build && npm pack
scripts.start: node scripts/setup-playground.js && npm run build && concurrently --kill-others "tsc --project tsconfig.build.json --watch" "rollup -c rollup.config.js -w"
scripts.test: npm run generate-typescript && tsc --project tsconfig.json && concurrently --kill-others "tsc --project tsconfig.json -w" "karma start karma.conf.js --browsers Chrome --no-single-run --reporters spec,kjhtml"
scripts.test-ci: npm run generate-typescript && tsc --project tsconfig.json && karma start karma.conf.js --browsers ChromeHeadless --single-run --reporters spec
scripts.generate-csharp: npm run generate-typescript && ts-node --project tsconfig.build-csharp.json src.compiler/csharp/CSharpTranspiler.ts --project tsconfig.build-csharp.json
scripts.build-csharp: npm run generate-csharp && cd src.csharp && dotnet build -c Release
scripts.build-csharp-ci: npm run clean && npm run generate-csharp && cd src.csharp && dotnet build -c Release
